subtitle.en: All application documents must be original or certified; no e-mail, scans or, copies will be accepted.
subtitle.zh: 所有申請文件必須是原件或經過認證的；不接受電子郵件、掃描件或影印件。

checklist.en: Complete, sign, and return this application form with a copy of the photo page in your passport.
checklist.zh: 填寫、簽署並寄回此申請表，並附上護照照片頁的副本。

checklist.en: Attach a recent photograph to the application form.
checklist.zh: 在申請表上附上一張近期照片。

checklist.en: Submit an original bank letter dated within the last 6 months with an official signature on bank letterhead that verifies the current balance in USD of your account or your sponsor's/guardian's account.
checklist.zh: 提交最近 6 個月內的銀行信函原件，並在銀行信箋上有正式簽名，以驗證您的帳戶或擔保人/監護人帳戶的當前美元餘額。

checklist.en: Submit proof of medical insurance or travel insurance.
checklist.zh: 提交醫療保險或旅遊保險證明。

checklist.en: Submit the credit card authorization for the fees.
Submit this Parental Release form for a minor student along with the refundable credit card authorization for the Guardianship Service Charge (if you are under 18 years old).
checklist.zh: 提交未成年學生的家長免責表以及監護服務費的可退還信用卡授權（如果您未滿 18 歲）。
